name: max_commutative
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝ : LinearOrder α
⊢ Commutative Max.max
decl:
@[deprecated instCommutativeMax (since := "2024-09-12")]
theorem max_commutative : Commutative (α := α) max := max_comm

name: max_associative
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝ : LinearOrder α
⊢ Associative Max.max
decl:
@[deprecated instAssociativeMax (since := "2024-09-12")]
theorem max_associative : Associative (α := α) max := max_assoc

name: min_commutative

inst✝ : LinearOrder α
⊢ Commutative Min.min
decl:
@[deprecated instCommutativeMin (since := "2024-09-12")]
theorem min_commutative : Commutative (α := α) min := min_comm

name: min_associative

α : Type u
inst✝ : LinearOrder α
⊢ Associative Min.min
decl:
